alerts.description: Notify CS on negative feedback on a case

fieldUpdates.name: Changes the case priority to high.

rules.description: -Inform CS, AM & Team members if criticality has been modified during Investigation

-Remind the responsible that the complaint created yesterday is still at draft creation stage (creation + 1) -Reminder to the CS and AM after 3 working days without moving -Reminder to the CS and AM after 7 working days without moving

-Notify GK when we reach the intermediary report deadline;15 days after complaint creation date and status is on Investigation -Reminder to owner after 10 working days without moving; 10 days after date of switch from Registration to Investigation
-Reminder to the CS or AM after 3 working days without moving -Reminder to the CS or AM after 7 working days without moving

-Reminder to AM / CS to report to customer when report date is not plugged after 2 days -4 days after date of switch to Report to Customer send to owner -6 days after date of switch to Report to Customer send to owner

rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CSE_Complaint' && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Draft Creation") && $User.ByPassWorkflows__c = FALSE && TECH_UpdateTriggerDate__c = TODAY()
